root.name: Top Gun: Hard Lock
root.description: OverviewTop Gun: Hard Lock is an arcade flight game developed by Headstrong games. It's roughly based on Top Gun, the 1980 Tom Cruise movie. The game lets players take part in dogfights as well as other military missions. The player will be able to pilot the legendary F-14 Tomcats and battle hostile MiGs. The game introduces a new mechanic to flight sim games, Hard Lock mode which lets you move quicker to the action.
